PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA MINING REGULATIONS which eliminate the three-year royalty free period and remove an incentive which favoured short-life high-grade mines over long-life operations.

precis:
Regulations Amending the CANADA MINING REGULATIONS which eliminate the
three-year royalty free period and remove an incentive which favoured
short-life high-grade mines over long-life operations.
